DOC.brief_title: Daily Vitamin K Patients Warfarin With Unstable INRs
DOC.detailed_description: Consistent daily Vitamin K intake may contribute stabilization INR value patient unstable INRs warfarin therapy . Subjects unstable INRs identify exist patient record UNC Anticoagulation Clinics . Eligible subject sign inform consent form receive point-of-care ( POC ) INR monitoring device . They undergo 9 week home INR monitoring via POC device ( monthly clinic follow-up ) . They subsequently provide 500 mcg Vitamin K tablet take daily . Weekly POC INR monitor monthly clinic follow-up continue additional 8 week .
DOC.criteria: Patient UNC Anticoagulation Clinic INR target 2.03.0 least 9 month uninterrupted warfarin Unstable INRs past 6 month , define minimum number warfarin dose change 3 Patient demonstration proper POC device technique 2 measurement one teach session investigator Age great equal 18 year Stroke TIA within previous 12 month VTE within last 3 month Antiphospholipid antibody syndrome Pregnant patient , since warfarin contraindicate pregnancy
